title: Wow!
review: What an exciting movie! Well done on every level: character development, cast, tempo, acting, stunning!

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: He's done it again, folks!
review: What a stunning movie! I could not have hoped for a better outcome. (No spoiler alert!) True Tarantino to give us much more than we could have hoped for and then some. Stunning period piece.
